Quote.Author: Chris Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: Any attempt to single out Islam would be a violation of the Constitution

Quote.Author: Chris Hardwick
Quote.QuoteValue: Comic-Con is nerd Christmas. People go wanting to have fun

Quote.Author: Chris Hardwick
Quote.QuoteValue: Traditionally nerd-based culture is now a big sector of pop culture

Quote.Author: Chris Hardwick
Quote.QuoteValue: Real philosophy is like trying to read an alarm system installation manual in Korean

Quote.Author: Chris Hardwick
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a personal blog, but why does anyone care that I went shopping for hats?

Quote.Author: Chris Hardwick
Quote.QuoteValue: We're not in an information age anymore. We're in the information management age

Quote.Author: Chris Hardwick
Quote.QuoteValue: I've gone from being bullied by jocks as a kid to being bullied by nerds as an adult

Quote.Author: Chris Hardwick
Quote.QuoteValue: My best friend, Wil Wheaton, identifies himself as a geek

Quote.Author: Chris Hardwick
Quote.QuoteValue: Any nerd who grew up around the time that I did, BBC programming was a treasure chest for us

Quote.Author: Chris Hardwick
Quote.QuoteValue: The lifeblood of YouTube is sharing

Quote.Author: Chris Hardwick
Quote.QuoteValue: A big company is like trying to steer a luxury liner

Quote.Author: Chris Isaak
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in showbusiness. I'm an entertainer

Quote.Author: Chris Isaak
Quote.QuoteValue: My only expenses are probably guitar strings and records

Quote.Author: Chris Isaak
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the kind of guy to talk about angels: I'm a very pragmatic kind of guy

Quote.Author: Chris Isaak
Quote.QuoteValue: I blow up fireworks all the time, and I love making milkshakes and banana splits

Quote.Author: Chris Isaak
Quote.QuoteValue: I put music on and I drive around town

Quote.Author: Chris Isaak
Quote.QuoteValue: I got by as a musician since day one. I don't live beyond my means. I have real cheap tastes

Quote.Author: Chris Isaak
Quote.QuoteValue: Any time you talk about your own stuff you sound self-aggrandising

Quote.Author: Chris Isaak
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep things pretty simple

Quote.Author: Chris Isaak
Quote.QuoteValue: My advice is: if you've got to be miserable to write great music, then drive a truck

Quote.Author: Chris Isaak
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a natural ham. It doesn't bother me to perform

Quote.Author: Chris Kirkpatrick
Quote.QuoteValue: Now I'm confused. Now I don't know what I want

Quote.Author: Chris Kirkpatrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in an underprivileged home

Quote.Author: Chris Kirkpatrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm into designing houses and interior design. I like change. I like creating things out of nothing

Quote.Author: Chris Kirkpatrick
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all about the special effects

Quote.Author: Chris Kirkpatrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I was very blessed with 'N Sync. It was a big success and it was a lot of fun

Quote.Author: Chris Kirkpatrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm like a bunch of college guys who got together and said, 'Let's make a dude, a crazy dude'

Quote.Author: Chris Kirkpatrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Eminem, I love Moby. Why can't we just be friends?

Quote.Author: Chris Kirkpatrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very happy and lonely single old man - and bitter

Quote.Author: Chris Kirkpatrick
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Latin women, yet for some reason I always wind up with blondes

Quote.Author: Chris Kirkpatrick
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone says, 'It's just an honor to be nominated,' but that's so not true. You want to win

Quote.Author: Chris Lilley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't just want to upset people and shock people by saying something really outrageous

Quote.Author: Chris Lilley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll probably be still playing a school girl when I'm 60

Quote.Author: Chris Lilley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm pretty lucky. I don't get too many haters

Quote.Author: Chris Lilley
Quote.QuoteValue: It's pretty awful being told you're a racist

Quote.Author: Chris Lilley
Quote.QuoteValue: British comedy fans go crazy

Quote.Author: Chris Lilley
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel really qualified to write about Australia

Quote.Author: Chris Lilley
Quote.QuoteValue: I think surprises make TV entertaining

Quote.Author: Chris Lilley
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes me ages to write stuff

Quote.Author: Chris Lilley
Quote.QuoteValue: I find teenage girls endlessly funny

Quote.Author: Chris Lilley
Quote.QuoteValue: I like playing all sorts of ages and genders

Quote.Author: Chris O'Dowd
Quote.QuoteValue: A guy who's actually self destructive is quite fun to play

Quote.Author: Chris O'Dowd
Quote.QuoteValue: Social media is great, I guess, but it feels like technology is the sapper of innocence

Quote.Author: Chris O'Dowd
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up among strong women so I know what it's like to be loved and humiliated in a heartbeat

Quote.Author: Chris O'Dowd
Quote.QuoteValue: When I say I hate nostalgia, I hate things set in the recent past where everything is shiny and new

Quote.Author: Chris O'Dowd
Quote.QuoteValue: What I think improv is great for is making dialogue more natural

Quote.Author: Chris O'Dowd
Quote.QuoteValue: I never go to these showbiz parties. I avoid them with a 10-inch pole

Quote.Author: Chris O'Dowd
Quote.QuoteValue: Reviewers are the worst laughers in the world

Quote.Author: Chris O'Dowd
Quote.QuoteValue: There tends to be a jealousy in England towards countries that are successful

Quote.Author: Chris O'Dowd
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more like a spoon symbol. I think women just want to spoon me

Quote.Author: Chris O'Dowd
Quote.QuoteValue: In comedy it helps if there's a friendly atmosphere on the set

Quote.Author: Chris Squire
Quote.QuoteValue: A nightmare is two bassists on stage

Quote.Author: Chris Squire
Quote.QuoteValue: You're only as big as your last hit

Quote.Author: Chris Squire
Quote.QuoteValue: After awhile, you start realizing that change is good for you. It's healthy

Quote.Author: Chris Squire
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope, after I'm gone, there will still be a Yes

Quote.Author: Chris Squire
Quote.QuoteValue: Pull the good out of it and not worry about the drawbacks

Quote.Author: Chris Squire
Quote.QuoteValue: '90125' was our biggest-selling album worldwide

Quote.Author: Chris Squire
Quote.QuoteValue: People are used to us being onstage for a while

Quote.Author: Chris Squire
Quote.QuoteValue: Over the years, Yes actually made 20 albums of original studio material

Quote.Author: Chris Squire
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't get session work because most musicians hated my style

Quote.Author: Chris Squire
Quote.QuoteValue: We started Yes as a vehicle to develop everyone's individual styles

Quote.Author: Chris Van Allsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: I write for what's left of the eight-year-old still rattling around inside my head

Quote.Author: Chris Van Allsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like to travel. Yet all my books seem to involve a journey

Quote.Author: Chris Van Allsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always a bit disappointed when I've finished working on a book

Quote.Author: Chris Van Allsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: I have very positive memories of reading biographies of unusual Americans as a child

Quote.Author: Chris Van Allsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a perfectionist. I'm just very observant

Quote.Author: Chris Van Allsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's difficult to forget things that are unresolved

Quote.Author: Chris Van Allsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the gizmos that transport people

Quote.Author: Chris Van Allsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: Even the most complicated stories start with a very simple premise

Quote.Author: Chris Van Allsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: Authors of books are not given very much control over the films that are made from their books

Quote.Author: Chris Van Allsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea of the extraordinary happening in the context of the ordinary is what's fascinating to me

Quote.Author: Chris Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think breakups are ever easy for anybody. If they are, they aren't much of a breakup

Quote.Author: Chris Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge fantasy football fan

Quote.Author: Chris Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Social media is a very, very powerful tool. It also gives power to tools

Quote.Author: Chris Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I really love something that's strong vocally and a little more difficult to sing because it's fun

Quote.Author: Chris Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I played a funeral convention once. York Casket Company pays well, in case anyone's wondering!

Quote.Author: Chris Young
Quote.QuoteValue: It's amazing to me how often the answer to making something sound better is to play something less

Quote.Author: Chris Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a sucker for a sad song

Quote.Author: Chris Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really loud. I can't sing softly

Quote.Author: Chris Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I go home, and there's dust on everything because I'm never there

Quote.Author: Chris Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Finding new books to read and relaxing is what I enjoy when I do have some time to spend on my own

Quote.Author: Chrissy Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm going to eat fast food, I'm going to McDonald's. I don't need to pretend

Quote.Author: Chrissy Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: That's one thing I get neurotic about: I need my soup to be crazy hot

Quote.Author: Chrissy Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like part of me will die when John Goodman dies

Quote.Author: Chrissy Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll come in from a long flight and go straight to the grocery store. I love cooking for my man

Quote.Author: Chrissy Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the farthest thing from a foodie or a food snob. Those people terrify me

Quote.Author: Chrissy Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: Making food is a wonderful way to spend a Friday night

Quote.Author: Chrissy Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: I work out every day. I still feel fit and energetic. In a way, I'm healthier now that I'm pregnant

Quote.Author: Chrissy Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: I always get to eat what I want because if I don't, I go insane

Quote.Author: Chrissy Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not good at taking pictures. I can't give a good face. I crack up

Quote.Author: Chrissy Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: I think, like, Twitter is somewhat difficult sometimes, and it can be kind of negative

Quote.Author: Christa McAuliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I touch the future. I teach

Quote.Author: Christa McAuliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: Reach for it. Push yourself as far as you can

Quote.Author: Christa McAuliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I really don't want to say goodbye to any of you people

Quote.Author: Christa McAuliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: Reach for the stars

Quote.Author: Christa McAuliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: Space is going to be commonplace

Quote.Author: Christa McAuliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: Every shuttle mission's been successful

Quote.Author: Christa McAuliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm 60, maybe, I'll look at my pile of papers and wonder, What really happened that year?

Quote.Author: Christa McAuliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: My sympathies have always been for working-class people

Quote.Author: Christa McAuliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: If anything, the overriding emotion is gonna just be excitement

Quote.Author: Christa McAuliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: If anything happened, I think my husband would have to deal with that as the time came

Quote.Author: Christian Lacroix
Quote.QuoteValue: There are days when I'm completely depressed and able to do only one drawing

Quote.Author: Christian Lacroix
Quote.QuoteValue: The world needs some excitement from fashion

Quote.Author: Christian Lacroix
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not nostalgic for the past

Quote.Author: Christian Lacroix
Quote.QuoteValue: I look for friends who make me laugh

Quote.Author: Christian Lacroix
Quote.QuoteValue: But the Milanese have made bad choices, bad fashion, and bad jewelry

Quote.Author: Christian Lacroix
Quote.QuoteValue: We all look for lost time

Quote.Author: Christian Lacroix
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always some kind of hidden logic

Quote.Author: Christian Lacroix
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea of seeing everybody clad the same is not really my cup of tea

Quote.Author: Christian Lacroix
Quote.QuoteValue: Very skinny women don't look beautiful in clothes

Quote.Author: Christian Lacroix
Quote.QuoteValue: I never loved the world around me as it was

Quote.Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote.QuoteValue: Next to being witty, the best thing is being able to quote another's wit

Quote.Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote.QuoteValue: Panic is a sudden desertion of us, and a going over to the enemy of our imagination

Quote.Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote.QuoteValue: Earth took her shining station as a star, In Heaven's dark hall, high up the crowd of worlds

Quote.Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote.QuoteValue: Heaven lent you a soul, Earth will lend a grave

Quote.Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote.QuoteValue: As threshing separates the wheat from the chaff, so does affliction purify virtue

Quote.Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is the fourth great material want, first food, then clothes, then shelter, then music

Quote.Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote.QuoteValue: The great artist is a slave to his ideals

Quote.Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote.QuoteValue: Our first and last love is self-love

Quote.Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote.QuoteValue: Tranquil pleasures last the longest; we are not fitted to bear the burden of great joys

Quote.Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote.QuoteValue: Tears are nature's lotion for the eyes. The eyes see better for being washed by them

Quote.Author: Christina Hendricks
Quote.QuoteValue: I think calling me 'full-figured' is just rude

Quote.Author: Christina Hendricks
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a problem keeping my mouth shut. I usually speak my mind. I'm trying to learn my lesson

Quote.Author: Christina Hendricks
Quote.QuoteValue: Sexiness is about being an individual and having conviction about what that is

Quote.Author: Christina Hendricks
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm either in heels or barefoot

Quote.Author: Christina Hendricks
Quote.QuoteValue: If I get any private time in my trailer, all of a sudden I'm doing sit-ups and push-ups

Quote.Author: Christina Hendricks
Quote.QuoteValue: My husband says, 'What Joan walk? You've always walked that way!'

Quote.Author: Christina Hendricks
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of the things people have said about me, well, they're unbelievable

Quote.Author: Christina Hendricks
Quote.QuoteValue: I just thought I would work in a hair salon and do community theater

Quote.Author: Christina Hendricks
Quote.QuoteValue: I love anything that's sort of surreal and with fantasy

Quote.Author: Christina Hendricks
Quote.QuoteValue: Anytime someone talks about your figure constantly, you get nervous; you get really self-conscious

Quote.Author: Christine Gregoire
Quote.QuoteValue: It's our responsibility to pass on what we inherited, not to squander it, but to build on it

Quote.Author: Christine Gregoire
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to take advantage of the opportunity we have now to create a vision and become great

Quote.Author: Christine Gregoire
Quote.QuoteValue: We must work to help all families and all communities realize their dream of a better future

Quote.Author: Christine Gregoire
Quote.QuoteValue: Education exposes young people to a broader world, a world full of opportunity and hope

Quote.Author: Christine Gregoire
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is the foundation upon which we build our future

Quote.Author: Christine Gregoire
Quote.QuoteValue: Education can lift individuals out of poverty and into rewarding careers

Quote.Author: Christine Gregoire
Quote.QuoteValue: We may disagree on some things, but we can do so without being disagreeable

Quote.Author: Christine Gregoire
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm free. I'm free to say what I feel

Quote.Author: Christine Gregoire
Quote.QuoteValue: We all leave personal legacies for the people we know and love

Quote.Author: Christine Gregoire
Quote.QuoteValue: In the field of health care, we are giving people access to insurance who have not had it before

Quote.Author: Christine Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: My biggest goal in life is to not be annoying about being a bride

Quote.Author: Christine Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not an inspirational quote kind of person

Quote.Author: Christine Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: Food is really important to me

Quote.Author: Christine Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: Seaweed sheets are my go-to for my salty chip cravings, especially wasabi flavored ones

Quote.Author: Christine Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't swim, and I actually hate sand

Quote.Author: Christine Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: My tolerance for tears is very little when you're beautiful and crying over nothing

Quote.Author: Christine Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: Bachelor parties are for the married guys

Quote.Author: Christine Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: I act much younger than I am

Quote.Author: Christine Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: I love dress shopping, and I love talking about the wedding food. That's what makes me happy

Quote.Author: Christo
Quote.QuoteValue: The work of art is a scream of freedom

Quote.Author: Christo
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't sell technical drawings except when they are incorporated into a drawing or a collage

Quote.Author: Christo
Quote.QuoteValue: And the most unusual and surrealistic place in New York City is Central Park

Quote.Author: Christo
Quote.QuoteValue: Because we do not sell photographs, we have no royalties on books, posters, postcards

Quote.Author: Christo
Quote.QuoteValue: But the drawings are not created only to be sold

Quote.Author: Christo
Quote.QuoteValue: You see, we are not machines and we do not have lots of ideas in a drawer

Quote.Author: Christo
Quote.QuoteValue: If some of our works are symphonies, then wrapped walkways was chamber music

Quote.Author: Christo
Quote.QuoteValue: It appears to be monumental only because it's art

Quote.Author: Christo
Quote.QuoteValue: Now, there is no way to say how long some projects take, that's our principle

Quote.Author: Christo
Quote.QuoteValue: Our work is a scream of freedom

Quote.Author: Christoph Waltz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very bad with improvisation. I hate it

Quote.Author: Christoph Waltz
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, you need the villain. If you don't have a villain, the good guy can stay home

Quote.Author: Christoph Waltz
Quote.QuoteValue: You're always being cast for what you've been in last

Quote.Author: Christoph Waltz
Quote.QuoteValue: I only do what I like to do

Quote.Author: Christoph Waltz
Quote.QuoteValue: By looking into more details of American history, we can make more sense of what's happening today

Quote.Author: Christoph Waltz
Quote.QuoteValue: Stephen Sondheim I am in awe of

Quote.Author: Christoph Waltz
Quote.QuoteValue: I take praise as not just a reward and a result but also as the beginning of a new process

Quote.Author: Christoph Waltz
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I don't support esoteric approaches to acting

Quote.Author: Christoph Waltz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm open to working anywhere, but not on anything

Quote.Author: Christoph Waltz
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to not feel misplaced if this tidal wave of appreciation is coming your way

Quote.Author: Christopher Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: We live - on a spinning planet in a world of spin

Quote.Author: Christopher Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: I had some adventures at the White House, but hardly enough to fill a full memoir

Quote.Author: Christopher Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope when I'm on my deathbed, people forgive me, because there is a lot to forgive

Quote.Author: Christopher Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Lobbyists didn't descend from a spaceship. They evolved organically from the way we do business

Quote.Author: Christopher Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: I certainly wish I were as good-looking as Aaron Eckhart

Quote.Author: Christopher Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Necessity is the mother of bipartisanship

Quote.Author: Christopher Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I got a lot of my 'funny' DNA from my mother, who had a glorious sense of the ridiculous

Quote.Author: Christopher Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Catch-22's admirers cross boundaries - ideological, generational, geographical

Quote.Author: Christopher Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a political thinker. I'm not even much of a thinker. I'm a hack novelist

Quote.Author: Christopher Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: I want Tom Clancy, the Maryland novelist, to write the story of the rest of my life

Quote.Author: Christopher Guest
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm married to the person I fell in love with

Quote.Author: Christopher Guest
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy is like music. You have to know the key and you have to find players with good chops

Quote.Author: Christopher Guest
Quote.QuoteValue: People who take themselves too seriously, who can't see anything else, are usually funny

Quote.Author: Christopher Guest
Quote.QuoteValue: I watch mostly documentaries and things that aren't remotely funny

Quote.Author: Christopher Guest
Quote.QuoteValue: Music means a great deal to me

Quote.Author: Christopher Guest
Quote.QuoteValue: When I look back on what I've done, I think I'm drawn to obsession, perhaps

Quote.Author: Christopher Guest
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know anyone who's ever taken a bus. It's a mysterious form of transportation

Quote.Author: Christopher Guest
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important thing about my life is this integrity, and you can't lie to yourself

Quote.Author: Christopher Guest
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to play music, and I like to be funny, so I just do both at the same time

Quote.Author: Christopher Guest
Quote.QuoteValue: I painted sets before I ever performed

Quote.Author: Christopher Meloni
Quote.QuoteValue: If you try hard enough, you can bend the spoon; you can shift reality

Quote.Author: Christopher Meloni
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd have to say Bali's my favorite place that I've visited

Quote.Author: Christopher Meloni
Quote.QuoteValue: I love feeling the crispness of fall and the sensuality of spring

Quote.Author: Christopher Meloni
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to act. I need to act. It's the big itch I need to scratch

Quote.Author: Christopher Meloni
Quote.QuoteValue: I never find sincerity offensive... so, be sincere

Quote.Author: Christopher Meloni
Quote.QuoteValue: I think to be a successful comic, you have to be exceptionally smart and exceptionally perceptive

Quote.Author: Christopher Meloni
Quote.QuoteValue: In my own defense, I wrote a one-man show, and that to me was more where I fit

Quote.Author: Christopher Meloni
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my children beyond all reason. They're my joy, even when they're wild with kid energy

Quote.Author: Christopher Meloni
Quote.QuoteValue: You can watch any episode you want and have a compelling story being told

Quote.Author: Christopher Meloni
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever envisions not one but two series in New York?

Quote.Author: Chrystia Freeland
Quote.QuoteValue: We recognize that NAFTA is a three-country agreement, and we need a three-country negotiation

Quote.Author: Chrystia Freeland
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all living in a world shaped by Reagan and his ideology of small 'l' liberalism

Quote.Author: Chrystia Freeland
Quote.QuoteValue: In America, we have equated personal business success with public virtue

Quote.Author: Chrystia Freeland
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't just want to be rich and successful, they want to be good

Quote.Author: Chrystia Freeland
Quote.QuoteValue: In practice, getting rid of crony capitalism is incredibly difficult

Quote.Author: Chrystia Freeland
Quote.QuoteValue: I interviewed Putin himself in 2000, shortly after he took over as president

Quote.Author: Chrystia Freeland
Quote.QuoteValue: It's good to be good at playing defence, but the best defence is a strong offence

Quote.Author: Chrystia Freeland
Quote.QuoteValue: I know Russia well

Quote.Author: Chrystia Freeland
Quote.QuoteValue: I cut my teeth as a journalist writing about societies that didn't have democracy

Quote.Author: Chrystia Freeland
Quote.QuoteValue: My respect for politicians has increased. It's hard work - even hard physical work

Quote.Author: Chuck Grassley
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe I should just go home and ride my tractor

Quote.Author: Chuck Grassley
Quote.QuoteValue: Someone has to pick up the tab when people get out of repaying their own debts

Quote.Author: Chuck Grassley
Quote.QuoteValue: Complacency by the watchdogs hurts both taxpayers and beneficiaries

Quote.Author: Chuck Grassley
Quote.QuoteValue: The bottom line is, there have been a lot of nuts elected to the United States Senate

Quote.Author: Chuck Grassley
Quote.QuoteValue: If I move one way, I lose a couple votes. If I move another way, I lose a couple votes

Quote.Author: Chuck Grassley
Quote.QuoteValue: In the case of the Japanese, they usually commit suicide before they make any apology

Quote.Author: Chuck Grassley
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that less presidential interference the better

Quote.Author: Chuck Grassley
Quote.QuoteValue: I can only answer for Chuck Grassley; I can't answer for anybody else

Quote.Author: Chuck Grassley
Quote.QuoteValue: You ought to serve on the platform you run on

Quote.Author: Chuck Grassley
Quote.QuoteValue: We should not have a government program that determines if you're going to pull the plug on grandma

Quote.Author: Cindy Crawford
Quote.QuoteValue: Having children really changes your priorities

Quote.Author: Cindy Crawford
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to try to be perfect at everything

Quote.Author: Cindy Crawford
Quote.QuoteValue: Even in normal life, I'm not the skinniest model

Quote.Author: Cindy Crawford
Quote.QuoteValue: I have cellulite. I admit it. But sometimes I just say, 'Screw it, I am going to wear a bikini.'

Quote.Author: Cindy Crawford
Quote.QuoteValue: Even I don't wake up looking like Cindy Crawford

Quote.Author: Cindy Crawford
Quote.QuoteValue: Not that I believe you can have it all: I believe you can have it all, just not at the same time

Quote.Author: Cindy Crawford
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't the most popular girl in school by any means

Quote.Author: Cindy Crawford
Quote.QuoteValue: Watching your husband become a father is really sexy and wonderful

Quote.Author: Cindy Crawford
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think makeup is rocket science or a cure for cancer

Quote.Author: Cindy Crawford
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a lot of people secretly wish they were a rock star, and I'm no exception

Quote.Author: Cindy Sheehan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just so honored that the universe chose me to be the spark that has set off a raging inferno

Quote.Author: Cindy Sheehan
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my biggest inspirations is President Hugo Chavez of Venezuela. Yea, President Hugo

Quote.Author: Cindy Sheehan
Quote.QuoteValue: I take deep breaths and be true to my heart

Quote.Author: Cindy Sheehan
Quote.QuoteValue: My son joined the army to protect America, not Israel

Quote.Author: Cindy Sheehan
Quote.QuoteValue: Our country has been overtaken by murderous thugs... gangsters who lust after fortunes and power

Quote.Author: Cindy Sheehan
Quote.QuoteValue: Many people in San Francisco know me, and they know my persistence

Quote.Author: Cindy Sheehan
Quote.QuoteValue: My children were the center of my life

Quote.Author: Cindy Sheehan
Quote.QuoteValue: My son died for lies

Quote.Author: Cindy Sheehan
Quote.QuoteValue: What is the 'noble cause' for which you sent our country to war?

Quote.Author: Cindy Sheehan
Quote.QuoteValue: Recruiters in our country are known for lying to people

Quote.Author: Claire Denis
Quote.QuoteValue: 'White Material' is about courage and craziness

Quote.Author: Claire Denis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not witty

Quote.Author: Claire Denis
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate the victimization of women, always

Quote.Author: Claire Denis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a tacky person, I think

Quote.Author: Claire Denis
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the eldest child; it's lonely at the top

Quote.Author: Claire Denis
Quote.QuoteValue: The history of colonisation cannot disappear

Quote.Author: Claire Denis
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not that I don't like words. There's sometimes no need for words

Quote.Author: Claire Denis
Quote.QuoteValue: Africa is no more this poor continent. It's on the march

Quote.Author: Claire Denis
Quote.QuoteValue: You can spend your whole life in France without ever thinking about the Legion

Quote.Author: Claire Denis
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought Vincent Lindon had a sexy body, a body you can trust, a solid body you can lean on
